_readme: The contents of this file are used to generate CHANGELOG.md; It's kept in JSON/parsable format to make it
possible to generate change-logs in other formats as well (when needed) and to do automatic releases based on
added change-log records. More on how to use it: https://github.com/vaimo/composer-changelogs

fix: Added required uninstall and deactivate methods to the Plugin.php class for composer 2 compatibility

allow the plugin to be installed as dependency to globally installed package (as part of dependency of some global package); previously caused every composerÂ call to crash with class declaration conflict
removed class reference to dependency that is not listed (and should not be) as dependency

breaking: behaviour: the default behaviour of the package is to install local version of the node even when global available; Flag 'forceLocal' renamed to 'useGlobal', defaults to FALSE
code: removed Windows support (currently not needed)
configuration: download path no longer configurable (will always be downloaded to a sub-folder of the package and binary script made to point to it)
feature: switched over to using Composer downloader through creating virtual package for the NodeJs
no longer downloading nodejs under it's own vendor namespace: rather using a sub-folder within the plugin (as it fully owns the download)

fix: make sure that no errors are encountered when plugin gets uninstalled
maintenance: all logic that relied on classes to be in certain depth of directory structure removed

breaking: event sequence changed where nodejs observers are triggered very early to allow other plugins that rely on nodejs to be installed to work correctly
maintenance: introduced static code analysis with compatibility ruleset (to make sure that hte plugin works with php5.3)
